captions.text: (MUFFLED SPEECH.)
Order! Order! Settle down, girls.
Ok, awesome.
Welcome to the bimonthly fan girl update meeting.

We have some new faces here today. Hi, Hannibal
girls!

Good to have you here. Now for today's order
of business.
First up, Sherlock girls. Any news?

Well, Benedict cumberbatch finally lifted
that pesky restraining order against us!
No one told us about his hounds, though.
Worth it!
Good work. Inform the Star Trek girls at once.
Firefly girls! What's new?
Nothing...
Wait wait wait wait wait,
Nope. Nothing.
Hang in there.
What's this? Hmm.

"Dear girls. due to some changes in my life,
and declining state of the franchise,
I'm leaving my role as head of the Harry Potter fan girlsl.

As you know, I got married last month, and
have a kid on the way. Quite simply- A life.

You should think about getting one, too. XOXO,
Becky.
Oh, how unfortunate.

-WHAT!? -Is that going to happen
to us too?!-Why did she have to be so mean?
Girls, calm down.

Does this happen to every fandom? We only
got like 6 or 7 more movies to go!
That's plenty! We're running out of books!
Girls!
Oh my god. Oh my god. Oh my god.
I'M BURDENED WITH GLORIOUS SORROW
Quiet! QUIET!

Look. It's true that Becky left us. And she's
not the first one.

But that doesn't mean it's gonna happen to
us.
We are fan girls!

And that's so much more than just coursing
endlessly through Tumblr,
Looking for leaked photos  of your favorite actors,
or waiting 30 hours in the comicon convention hall for your show's panel
and peeing into a plastic bag to save your seat.
It's a way of life. It defines us.
And that doesn't change if you fandom kind of died out
Or nobody likes it but you.
And even if you do have a kid.

Yeah! Star Trek was just rebooted. Who knows
whats next?

Exactly. We should be happy about new oppurtunities,
sequels, or ever NEW fandoms.
To be a fangirl, is to have hope.
Yeah. Yeah!
(Clapping)
Plus Becky's fanfics were fucking terrible.
-I know, right? -Totally.
